p: The adhesion ability of L. fermentum isolates was performed on colonocyte-like Caco-2 cells. Caco-2 was purchased from the European Collection of Cell Cultures (ECACC No. 86010202). The culture and maintenance of the cells were done according to procedures described by Sánchez et al. (2010) using Dulbecco’s Modified Eagle Medium (DMEM) supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS), 100 U/ml penicillin and 100 mg/ml streptomycin and 2 mM l-glutamine. Media and reagents were purchased from Thermo Fisher Scientific. The adherence (expressed as a percentage) was calculated as: CFU adhered bacteria/CFU added bacteria. Experiments were performed in two replicated plates and in each plate; three wells were used per sample.
